message.body: And when does this fabulous job of yours start?
I squatted on campus relaxing during the day and having a date with my girlfriend for dinner :) now I'm off to the beach with my suitemates! My job starts June 10th. What are you up to this summer?

Nice! Sounds like a wonderful birthday! :) do you have your own apartment in Philly now? So exciting about the job! I'm working at L'OCCITANE, a French beauty boutique and I'm absolutely loving it! Subletting an apartment in Brighton until I move in with my queer feminist friends on September 1st. I've also been seeing someone for the past couple of months! Not exclusively, just dating casually, but I like her a lot. :)
That's awesome!!! I want to hear all about it - can we Skype soon? Yeah I have a place in Philly...I move in on June 1st!
Yes please!!! Sometime next week perhaps? I'll let you know when I have my work schedule for next week. :) So exciting- good luck moving!!!!
